annotations.normalized_text: Backstone Beck catchment of Ilkley Moor

tweets.text: Stone mini dams being installed within the Backstone Beck catchment of Ilkley Moor. This is to try and slow the flow of water into Ilkley. Working in partnership with @Bradford_CROW @bradfordmdc @EnvAgencyYNE #naturalfloodmanagement #nfm #naturalprocesses #moorland https://t.co/Rp6aEDOtbM
